Name: Kith and Kin
Phase6Description: An ancient curse has long called unfortunate souls to their doom. Now, an elder named Chabi has asked me to seek the living dead in Khargai Crags and collect any personal effects to remember them by.
Phase9Description: I have collected various mementos from the living dead in the Khargai Crags. I should return them to Chabi at the Onyx Watchtower.
Toast: An old woman seeks mementos from those who have died of an ancient curse.
